issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: As part of the engineering week decisions, we are planning to have an asynchronous, non blocking file-system module that will eventually deprecate the old one as we are moving forward with it. In an ideal case, it will share the API with the NodeJS system-module {{fs}} for improved interoperability.
